attributes.action: The EFL have shown themselves to be Inept  and should be disbanded
attributes.additional_details: A series of poor, and non transparent decisions over many years
attributes.background: Examine the EFL to see whether there are any signs of corruption or nepotism, and confirm that they are ineffective at protecting the best interests of clubs and fans

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331589
